question: 無理
sourceAnswer: unreasonable/unnatural/unjustifiable | impossible | forcible/forced/compulsory | excessive-(work,-etc.)/immoderate | to{?}{work-too-hard/try-too-hard} | no-way/not-a-chance/never/dream-on | irrational
sourceMnemonic: If you can do <kanji>nothing</kanji> within <kanji>reason</kanji>, then what you're trying to do is <vocabulary>unreasonable</vocabulary> and probably downright <vocabulary>impossible</vocabulary>. If you still try, you're probably just <vocabulary>overdoing</vocabulary> it.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. As long as you know the readings for these kanji, you should be able to read this word just fine.
